key.name: order
key.description: The order of the window buttons (e.g. :minimize,maximize,close). Colon represents the stuff in the middle. Supports 'minimize', 'maximize' and 'close'. Anything to the left of the colon is currently ignored.

key.name: theme
key.description: The name of the theme to use.

key.name: pinch
key.description: Use custom button order or the order pinch settings from Cinnamon/Metacity.

key.name: dogtk
key.description: Try to use the theme with the same name as the current gtk theme.

key.name: onlymax
key.description: Prioritise controlling windows which are maximized.

key.name: hideonnomax
key.summary: Hide if not controlling maximized windows
key.description: If the 'onlymax' option is set, the buttons will be hidden if there are no maximized windows in the active workspace. If 'onlymax' is not set, the buttons will be hidden if the active window is not maximized.
